short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace your New Tab page with a simple to-do list, plus beautiful wallpapers that you can change with a click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A New tab Chrome extension that gives you:

- Todo list app, always visible and easy to manage
- Local Storage support for your todos
- Beautiful wallpapers from Unsplash api
- Change your background with a click and even select it by tag
- Emoji api integration (slack like create emojis)
